attributes.action: Allow people to vote for and against a petition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To be able to get a better view to the support of a petition allow people to vote for and against it.

rejection.details:
This is dealt with in our faqs:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/faq
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
